    • loadPageWithFadeTransition

      public javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loadPageWithFadeTransition(String fxmlPath)
      This method is used to load a page with a fade transition. The returned FXMLLoader object can be used to pass a reference of MainWindowController to the controller of the loaded page.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - The path to the FXML file.
      Returns:
      The FXMLLoader object.
